verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) When the Lord <WH3068> brought <WH7725> back <WH7725> the captive <WH7622> ones of Zion, <WH6726> We were like those who dream. <WH2492>

Then <WH227> our mouth <WH6310> was filled <WH4390> with laughter, <WH7814> And our tongue <WH3956> with joyful <WH7440> shouting; <WH7440> Then <WH227> they said <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> "The Lord <WH3068> has done <WH6213> great <WH1431> things <WH1431> for them."
The Lord <WH3068> has done <WH6213> great <WH1431> things <WH1431> for us; We are glad. <WH8056>
Restore <WH7725> our captivity, <WH7622> O Lord, <WH3068> As the streams <WH650> in the South. <WH5045>
Those who sow <WH2232> in tears <WH1832> shall reap <WH7114> with joyful <WH7440> shouting. <WH7440>

He who goes <WH1980> to and fro <WH1980> weeping, <WH1058> carrying <WH5375> [his] bag <WH4901> of seed, <WH2233> Shall indeed <WH935> come <WH935> again with a shout <WH7440> of joy, <WH7440> bringing <WH5375> his sheaves <WH485> [with him].
